description:
The Comprehensive Ocean-Atmosphere Data Set (COADS) is the most extensive collection of surface marine data available for the world ocean over the past two centuries. Measures parameters such as air temperature, sea level pressure, sea surface temperature, scalar wind, specific and relative humidity, and heat parameters.
The BCLME (Benguela Current Large Marine Ecosystem) includes the countries Angola, Namibia and South Africa.
keywords: Atlas, BCLME, Atmosphere | Atmospheric Temperature | Surface Air Temperature
name: BCLME: Air temperature
